title: Replay Ep 61: Talk It Out with Nicole Byer
itunes:title: Replay Ep 61: Talk It Out with Nicole Byer

description:
Hi listeners! We’re taking a break this week, but please enjoy one of our favorite Forever35 episodes from February 2019.


This week, Doree talks about writing her new book, making a labor playlist, and her new favorite TV shows. Kate discusses her negative thought spirals, going back to therapy, and finding another new recipe to try. Plus, they finally discover that Gmail does indeed have folders!


Then they welcome Nicole Byer — actress, comedian, podcaster, and host of Netflix’s Nailed It! She chats about dating and communicating sexual desires to a partner, pole dancing class as self-care, being diagnosed with ADD as an adult, and why she embraced fat jokes in her stand up special.


View the original show notes here. 


This episode is sponsored by: 

INKEYLIST - Visit theinkeylist.com to get started on your own skincare journey.

GRASS ROOTS FARMERS COOPERATIVE - Go to grassrootscoop.com/FOREVER35 for a special, limited time offer of $40 Off, plus Free Shipping!

MIRO - Start collaborating for FREE when you sign up for an account at Miro.com/FOREVER35.  

PURPLE - Go to Purple.com/forever35, and use promo code FOREVER35. For a limited time, you’ll get $150 off any Purple mattress order of $1500 or more!


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
